title: who is the most BORING champion to play?
body: I was playing {{champion:14}} the other day, and thought about uninstalling. Any other boring champions?

replies.body:
WW imo.

I like Sion. His ult. is fun.
nah
a 2 second ult that has a % chance of dashing into an obstacle.. so fun
i dont think you're playing him right...

{{champion:19}} literally all he does is right click on people and self heal, with the occasional R.

{{champion:117}} All of the fun parts of her kit were gutted and power shifted into her E shield. Zzzzzz.......

I actually find Sion a lot of fun.

> {{champion:19}} literally all he does is right click on people and self heal, with the occasional R.

Saw a quote about WW in another similar thread a while ago...

Warwick smacks things. His abilities make him smack things faster.

Janna

Your gameplay literally reqiire you to do nothing.

{{champion:75}}

"Looks like I'm gonna be top a while. Hope you are fine without me for the next 30 or so minutes".
so true, but he isnt boring, his social experiance is kinda weak
{{champion:40}}  . but then again shes top tier support with 0 mechanics and brain cells needed to do immense "plays" so i gotta keep sleeping on my keyboard
Heimer is fun but is boring

WHATFACE

skarner{{champion:72}}is the most boring jungler 4 sure, all you do is break your Q key and rmb...
He might even be the most boring champ, cuse even when i got a pentakill with him, i still didn't want to play him again.
I think Sion is very interesting, and the most boring champ for me is WW. 2 point'n'click, 1 steroid and a passive. I'm glad he's the next rework.
{{champion:23}}
For a while i thought it was {{champion:57}}. But then i played him support and its actually fun as fuck. now im going with {{champion:1}}
{{champion:16}} {{champion:101}}  are imo the 2 most boring. But again, this is all just an opinion thread lol.
{{champion:57}}
